name: dark feast
desc: Tear life force from everything nearby and consume it to recover your own.

name: defensive stance
desc: Shift your focus from dodging to parrying.
flavor: Face to face.

name: avoiding stance
desc: Shift your focus from parrying back to dodging.
flavor: Footwork and agility.

name: invigorate
desc: Utilize your stamina for combat.

name: dash(deprecated)
desc: Used to be a means of faster traversal, now [deprecated].

name: minor fount
flavor: Come thou fount.

desc: Wake a slumbering ally.
Remove fear from yourself or a frightened creature.
Breaks a curse of silence.

name: cure paralysis
desc: Loosens rigid muscles, nerves, and bones.

name: cure sickness
desc: Cure sickness on yourself or an ally.

name: fount
flavor: Come thou fount.

name: pilfer
desc: Unburden your opponent of excess gold, valuable pieces of anatomy and other materials of use to an enterprising wizard.
extdesc: Effect scales with the level of your opponent and your dedication to trickery. It is relatively random. Shown value approximates what you would get if you were stealing from yourself.
flavor: Gold coins, dragon scales, mountain oysters, some kind of a beacon...

name: borrow time
desc: Just a couple of seconds, nothing bad ever happens in that amount of time.
flavor: May I have a second of your time?

name: midsummer night
desc: Pull everyone into a dream of your making.
flavor: If you die in a dream, you die in real life.

name: crystal seeding
desc: Afflict the opponent with an earthen curse, so that their bones turn into gems.
extdesc: Gains 1 gem for every 10 defense the opponent had
flavor: Sure to baffle future paleontologists.

name: coagulant injection
desc: Inject an enemy with a coagulant, allowing you to crystallize their blood.
extdesc: Amount of blood gems acquired is approximately 1 per 250 maximum hp an opponent had
flavor: A blood-curdling sight.

desc: The full weight of a wizard's gaze is often overpowering.
Decreases the target's resistance to shadow magic.

name: soulbind branding
desc: Carve a set of soul-trapping runes into an enemy's flesh, to prevent their soul from escaping your grasp
flavor: It shall be engraved upon your soul!

name: embalming injection
desc: Inject an enemy with embalming fluid to preserve the corpse for later.
flavor: Gives an entirely new definition to "living dead".

name: dark promptings
desc: Malevolent voices whisper secrets to your mind.

name: Summon Imps
desc: Summon your patron's weakest servants to perish for you.

name: Summon quasit
desc: Summon one of your patron's servants to die for you.

name: summon grimstalk
desc: Summon one of your patron's servants to endure for you.

name: summon demon
desc: Summon one of your patron's servants to fight for you.

name: lesser pulsing light
desc: A small pulse of light zips around you, mending injuries.

name: pulsing light
desc: A pulse of light zips around you, mending injuries.

name: greater pulsing light
desc: A large pulse of light zips around you, mending injuries.
needtext: Cannot be sinister and must be at least scrupulous.

name: prismatic spray
desc: Lines of arcane energy damage all enemies.

name: greater prismatic spray
desc: Lines of arcane energy strike all enemies.

name: fling stone
desc: Throw a rock using magic.

name: mud
desc: Engulfs target in mud.

name: fire bolt
desc: A small bolt of flame.

name: searing bolt
desc: A bolt of fire with lingering flames

name: light spear
desc: A barb of solid light.

name: greater light spear
desc: A lance of solid light.

name: magma bolt
desc: A bolt of liquid-hot magma

name: water spray
desc: A violent burst of water.

name: frost bolt
desc: A sharp shard of ice.

name: frost bolt II
desc: Fling a large shard of ice.

name: frost bolt III
desc: A heavy shard of ice.

name: poison ward
desc: Reduce the efficacy of common venoms.

name: vine whip
desc: Vines lash out from the ground.

name: summon hobgoblin
desc: In combat, summon a hobgoblin to fight for you.

name: summon spider
desc: Summon a spider to fight for you.
Reanimate a weak undead minion.

name: greater reanimate
desc: Reanimate a stronger undead minion.
Call back to life a weak humanoid or goblinoid minion.

name: magic tending
desc: Revive a weak beast minion.

name: wild tending
desc: Revive a stronger beast minion.
Imbue your weapon with flame before striking.
needtext: Currently equipped weapon must be martial

name: summon unicorn
desc: In combat, summon an unicorn to fight for you.

name: to sand
desc: Transform your body into fine-grained sand.
Command the earth to swallow the enemy.
Bury your enemies deep beneath the ground.

needtext: Currently equipped weapon must be blunt.

desc: Crack the earth beneath the feet of your enemy.
needtext: Currently equipped weapon must be blunt.

name: sealing light
desc: Seams of light close your wounds.

name: windcomb
desc: Use directed gusts of wind to clear away debris and detritus, making exploration a much more profitable affair.

name: insight
desc: All your studies fall neatly into place.
flavor: I know the pieces fit.

name: fire sense
desc: Temporarily increase your natural aptitude for fire.

name: earth sense
desc: Temporarily increase your natural aptitude for earth.

name: water sense
desc: Temporarily increase your natural aptitude for water.

name: wind sense
desc: Temporarily increase your natural aptitude for air.

name: natural instinct
desc: Enhance your sense of smell to more easily locate herbs worth harvesting.

name: ancient communion
desc: Call on remnants of the dead to impart the knowledge of their lives. Has a relatively short effective range.
flavor: Did you hear something?

desc: Curse an enemy with a streak of bad luck.

name: dust devil
desc: A whirl of wind at your feet.

name: dust devil II
desc: A whirl of wind at your feet.

name: mass jinx
desc: Curse all enemies with a streak of bad luck.

name: sealing light II
desc: Seams of light close your wounds.
An electric shock leaps from your fingers.

name: lightning
desc: An arc of lightning flashes from the sky.
flavor: Shazaaam?

name: doublestrike
desc: Twin arcs of lightning flash from the sky.
flavor: Sometimes lightning does strike twice.

name: thunderstrike
desc: A blinding storm of lightning.

name: down swinging
desc: You won't go down without a fight.
flavor: Am I more than you bargained for yet?

name: last stand
desc: Before your body is dry.
flavor: Don't lose your way.

desc: A projectile made of your blood savagely mutilates the enemy.
extdesc: Costs part of your hp, scaling with the amount of blood mastery classes you took. Deals damage based on your max hp, improved with use and blood classes taken.
flavor: You would put it in a sausage instead, but you are not in the mood.

desc: Blast all enemies with crystallized shards of magically charged blood.

name: gem resonance
desc: Use your knowledge of the earth to detect valuable gemstones by their resonance.
flavor: Hi-Ho, Hi-Ho.

name: dbulm's apiary
desc: In combat, summon a really angry bee to fight for you.
flavor: Beees.

desc: You can't escape the sky.

name: copper skin
desc: Hardens the skin of the self.

name: iron skin
desc: Hardens the skin of the self.

name: steel skin
desc: Hardens the skin of the self.

name: adamant shell
desc: Your skin becomes adamant.
The earth shakes beneath your enemies' feet.
The earth shakes at your command.

name: resist paralysis
desc: Keep your limbs fluid.

name: resist silence
desc: Keep your mind active and alert.

name: quenching sphere
desc: Temporarily negate all fire damage.
Herbs sprout all around you as you walk.

name: blinding flash
desc: A flash of pure white light.

name: high tide
desc: Flood the field of battle.
A fungal cloud that damages all enemies.

name: sealing light III
desc: Seams of light close your wounds.
needtext: Cannot be sinister and must be at least scrupulous.

name: force ten
desc: The storm before the calm.
flavor: Force without form.

desc: Rain hell from above

name: greater quenching sphere
desc: Temporarily negate all fire damage.

name: calming murmurs
desc: Whispers on the wind calm your troubled mind.

name: soothing breeze
desc: A light wind steadies your nerves.

name: quickening melody
desc: A magical melody that quickens everyone's pace.

name: luminescent enchantment
desc: Conjure a swirling array of dancing lights that stick to everyone.

name: glimmering aura
desc: Render a gemstone into a temporary source of illumination.

name: eclipsing desolate destinies
desc: Fill the mind of a foe with visions of varying horrifying fates, forcing them to grapple with the reality of their imminent demise.
Cure yourself or an ally of a charm.

name: bolstering hope
desc: Gently disperse the essence of hopeful aspirations, imbuing the minds of others.

name: aura of benevolence
desc: Use your life force to produce a beneficial aura, mending the wounds and spirits of your allies.

name: lesser mending river
desc: Cleansing waters trickle over you, slowly mending your wounds.

name: mending river
desc: Cleansing waters flow over you, slowly mending your wounds.

name: greater mending river
desc: Cleansing waters rush over you, rapidly mending your wounds.

name: lesser life's bloom
desc: Wild energies flow through you, slowly closing wounds before providing a burst of healing energy.

name: life's bloom
desc: Wild energies course through you, knitting together injuries and then providing a rapid burst of healing.

name: lesser etherealness
desc: A partial intangibility to protect from physical attacks.

name: etherealness
desc: More potent than its predecessor, with greater protection against the weapons of your enemies.

name: ghostly assistants
desc: Unseen spirits assist you in compiling knowledge, speeding your work.
flavor: The sound of quill scratching against parchment seem ceaseless.

name: spiritual possession
desc: Entreat a captured soul to briefly possess an enemy before being granted its release.
flavor: Their screams of terror would pierce your ears, if only they could make a sound.

name: befuddling spirits
desc: Confuse the mind of the target.

name: summon arcane serpent
desc: In combat, summon an arcane serpent to fight for you.

name: summon fulminant prism
desc: In combat, create a fulminant prism to destroy your enemies.

name: summon heroic ancestor
desc: In combat, summon an ancestral hero to defend you.

name: summon frost giant
desc: In combat, summon a frost giant to fight for you.

name: summon phoenix
desc: In combat, summon a phoenix to fight for you.

name: summon sand mite
desc: In combat, summon a sand mite to fight for you.

name: coalesce shadow
desc: Animate your shadow for a dependable ally- a risky move.

name: summon rune of agony
desc: Summon a rune of pure suffering. Its dark power doesn't distinguish between friend and foe.

name: summon nova
desc: Summon an incarnation of extreme light as an ally.

name: summon black hole
desc: Summon an incarnation of extreme shadow as an ally.

name: reclaim power
desc: Sacrifice the minion with proportionally the lowest current life to buff everyone else. It's fine, summons are just mana simulacra.
flavor: Just be careful not to use it on non-summoned minions, okay? Okay.

name: absorb summon
desc: Sacrifice the minion with the highest life to heal yourself. Remember, summons are merely mana simulacra.
flavor: Just be careful not to use it on non-summoned minions, okay? Okay.

name: conjure minion armor
desc: Conjure armor for your precious minions.

name: conjure stone barrier
desc: Conjure a wall of stone to protect yourself.

name: conjure beartrap
desc: Conjure a bear trap to maim someone.

name: illusive dance
desc: A bewildering dance that makes you seem to be in multiple places at once.
This one has you actually shift between multiple places at once.
flavor: Or are you just rolling around at the speed of sound?

name: steal fortune
desc: Claim your enemy's fortune for yourself.

name: steal mana
desc: Claim your enemy's magic for yourself.

name: convenient physics
desc: Alter reality to make certain injuries irrelevant.
flavor: Fire only leaves a layer of soot. Your body bounces back from impacts. Holes plug themselves back up.

name: chaos bolt
desc: A brief burst of magic destabilizing whatever it touches.

name: chaos wave
desc: Research suggests that your enemies dislike having bits swapped at random.

name: chaos blast
desc: An onslaught of chaos drowns your foe.

name: chaos storm
desc: You've learned to swap bits between living and inanimate things.

name: unmake
desc: The weight of your will grinds your adversaries away.

name: world of chaos
desc: Elements invert. Ground and sky dance. Gales howl, and fragments slice.
flavor: Let all glimpse how it was before the beginning.

name: douse in petroleum
desc: Make an enemy more susceptible to flames.
flavor: For when you feel too impatient to heat the tar and feathers.

name: elemental inversion
desc: Invert the cycle of the natural elements within the target to create a weakness to them.

name: esoteric inversion
desc: Invert the cycle of the esoteric elements within the target to create a weakness to them.

name: physical inversion
desc: Invert the regulation of matter within the target to create a weakness to physical attacks.

name: reality inversion
desc: Invert the laws of reality within the target to create a weakness to chaos.

name: debilitate
desc: Weaken the concept of your enemy just so, and render them no longer immune to attacks.

name: chaotic madness
desc: Chaos makes it impossible to think straight.

name: chewing gum prank
desc: Trip up your enemies.
flavor: Double the flavor, stick both their feet to the ground and double your fun.

name: randomize armor
desc: Rearrange your enemies' defenses.
flavor: A pauldron does no good worn like a crown.

name: facioplasty
desc: Replace your injured flesh.
flavor: For most, this would be a disfiguring injury.  For me, it is merely an inconvenience.

desc: A weak projection of astral energy. Perhaps you could do better if you devoted yourself fully to the study of stars.
Borrow a little of the influence of a star. Perhaps you could do better if you devoted yourself fully to the study of stars.
